venue.address_2: cross street Center between Chapel and Crown
venue.name: Bentara

item.description:
First off sorry to all for the late notice about location! Last month we talked about having a meetup at the office of Elements, but that turned out not to be possible for this month. And then I ended up having to schedule a business trip - leaving today, so I will not be there.

Due to that combination I recommend that we have another meet and greet like last month, and then launch into the mini-panels starting in October.

So, please come to Bentara and mingle and have fun and get to know each other and brainstorm some ideas for a mini-panel.

See you all next month!

- Your Organizer
item.name: Greater New Haven Design September Meetup
